task.is-critical: Is task critical for the event?
task.creator: Task Creator
task.cant-take-messages: Cannot take tasks at the moment
task.cant-take-messages-limit: You've reach the limit of task for one user, cannot take more tasks at this point
task.unassigned: Task responsibility removed, task is now free

user.email: Your email address (Will be used to notify me when someone comment on my task):

comments.title: Comments
comments.placeholder: This is the place to comment. Is there someone you think the task owner should talk to? Is there anything they should know?

welcome.heading: Welcome to the doocrate
welcome.heading2: A co-creational events task management system
welcome.registration: Upon registering you will be transferred to the task system
welcome.before-start: A few important notes before we begin:
welcome.instruction1: Anyone can take ownership of a task (As long as it's unassigned)
welcome.instruction2: Please only take ownership of one task to allow everyone to participate
welcome.instruction3: Anyone can offer any task, even without registering to the system
welcome.instruction4: The event will only happen if all critical tasks are met
welcome.instruction5: Everything else, that we won't do - Won't happen :)

footer.people: the humans who crafted this system
